languages.text: "О да". {n}Старица почтительно кивает.{/n} "Сменилось множество сезонов с тех пор, как эта правительница получила благословение Бога-орла и встала во главе сего племени. Лишь приближенным к богам дозволено носить на себе их клейма, и эта правительница — одна из них".

traits.locale_text: "О да". {n}Старица почтительно кивает.{/n} "Сменилось множество сезонов с тех пор, как эта правительница получила благословение Бога-орла и встала во главе сего племени. Лишь приближенным к богам дозволено носить на себе их клейма, и эта правительница — одна из них".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: «Oh, sí». {n}La anciana asiente respetuosamente.{/n} «Han transcurrido muchas estaciones desde que esta jefa recibió la bendición del Dios Águila y se convirtió en líder de esta tribu. Solo quienes están cerca de los dioses tienen el privilegio de portar sus marcas, y esta jefa es una de los elegidos».
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, sí». {n}La anciana sacerdotisa asiente respetuosamente.{/n} «Han transcurrido muchas estaciones desde que esta jefa recibió la bendición del Dios Águila y se convirtió en líder de esta tribu. Solo quienes están cerca de los dioses tienen el privilegio de portar sus marcas, y esta jefa es una de los elegidos».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: “哦，是的。”{n}老妇人恭敬地点点头。{/n}“自从此酋长获得鹰神的祝福，成为部落的领袖之后，已经过去了许多个时节。只有亲近神明之人才能携带神明的印记，而此酋长就是其中之一。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."

traits.locale_text: “哦，是的。”{n}年迈的女祭司恭敬地点点头。{/n}“自从此酋长获得鹰神的祝福，成为部落的领袖之后，已经过去了许多个时节。只有亲近神明之人才能携带神明的印记，而此酋长就是其中之一。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: « C'est exact, {n}répond-elle en hochant respectueusement la tête.{/n} De nombreuses saisons sont passées depuis que cette dirigeante a reçu la bénédiction de l'Aigle-Dieu et a reçu la charge de cette tribu. Cette marque est le privilège de ceux qui sont proches des dieux, dont cette dirigeante fait partie. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact, {n}répond-elle en hochant respectueusement la tête.{/n} De nombreuses saisons sont passées depuis que cette dirigeante a reçu la bénédiction de l'Aigle-Dieu et est devenue chef de cette tribu. Cette marque est le privilège de ceux qui sont proches des dieux, dont cette dirigeante fait partie. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: 「ああ、そうです」{n}老人が恭しくうなずいた。{/n}「この支配者が鷲神の祝福を受け、この部族の指導者となってから、多くの季節が移り変わってきました。神々に近しい者だけがその烙印を許されるのです。そして、この支配者もその1人なのです」
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうです」{n}老人が恭しくうなずいた。{/n}「この支配者が鷲神の祝福を受け、この部族の指導者となってから、多くの季節が移り変わってきました。神々に近しい者だけがその烙印を許されるのです。そして、この支配者もその1人なのです」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Oh ja." {n}Die Älteste nickt respektvoll.{/n} "Oft haben die Jahreszeiten gewechselt, seit diese Herrscherin den Segen des Adler-Gottes empfangen hat und Anführerin dieses Stammes geworden ist. Nur, wer den Göttern nah ist, darf ihre Brandzeichen tragen, und diese Herrscherin gehört dazu."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja." {n}Die alte Priesterin nickt respektvoll.{/n} "Oft haben die Jahreszeiten gewechselt, seit diese Herrscherin den Segen des Adler-Gottes empfangen hat und Anführerin dieses Stammes geworden ist. Nur, wer den Göttern nah ist, darf ihre Brandzeichen tragen, und diese Herrscherin gehört dazu."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: "Tabii ki." {n}İhtiyar, hürmetle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu hükümdarın Kartal Tanrı'nın lütfunu alarak kabilesinin reisi olmasından bu yana pek çok mevsim geldi geçti. Yalnızca tanrılara yakın olanlar, onların damgalarını taşımaya layıktır ve bu hükümdar da onlardan biridir."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes." {n}The elder nods respectfully.{/n} "Many seasons have changed since this ruler received the Eagle-God's blessing and became the leader of this tribe. Only those close to the gods are allowed to bear their brands, and this ruler is one of them."
